summary:
this mod add all the daedra (azura molag bal ect...) as followers in a completly new place named Mundus near oblivion

this is just a new daedra its  not the oroginal ones so dont worry it dont retex anything and it dont interface anyhing
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone im skull19972 and this is my mod number 7

This add a new Island by the name Mundus in oblivion
You can see pic 
i dident create the name Mundus of my island 
Mundus is an existen island but not created in skyrim
you can see \"the elder of scroll skyrim Mundus wikipedia\" 
Mundus is a planet near oblivion where the daedras princes of the nirn live so i did create a little place its like a part of Mundus

check skyrim Mundus wiki!!!

the Island obtain all the daedras princes and princess statue with some chests a table a firewood a bed just to look awesome like a home
in this new Island you will see the daedras that i mad they look like their statues they are extremely very powerful and strong and they live in that island + a note in the island see pic
they are followers and don\'t worry i did just create them they are not the oroginal ones so it dont interface or retex any thing in the game

Hircine is a werewolf all other daedras is humans Dremoras and Atronachs form
They are followers and they live with you in that island you can see the location in pictures its too far on the left of markarth
They are the best and the strongest followers you can ever see just like my mod number 6
The divines Followers!!!

That was my mod bye bye



Good bye im Skull19972 and this is my mod number 7 Enjoy!!!
author: skull19972
